sdramc.h File Reference

Detailed Description

SDRAMC on EBI driver for AVR32 UC3.

  • Compiler: IAR EWAVR32 and GNU GCC for AVR32
  • Supported devices: All AVR32 devices with an SDRAMC module can be used.
  • AppNote:

Author:
Atmel Corporation: http://www.atmel.com
Support and FAQ: http://support.atmel.no/

Definition in file sdramc.h.

#include <avr32/io.h>

Definition at line 57 of file sdramc.h.

Referenced by main(), and sdramc_init().

#define SDRAM_SIZE

Value:

(1 << (SDRAM_BANK_BITS + \
                               SDRAM_ROW_BITS  + \
                               SDRAM_COL_BITS  + \
                               (SDRAM_DBW >> 4)))
SDRAM size.

Function Documentation

void sdramc_init ( unsigned long  hsb_hz  ) 

Initializes the AVR32 SDRAM Controller and the connected SDRAM(s).

Parameters:
hsb_hz HSB frequency in Hz (the HSB frequency is applied to the SDRAMC and to the SDRAM).
Note:
HMATRIX and SDRAMC registers are always read with a dummy load operation after having been written to, in order to force write-back before executing the following accesses, which depend on the values set in these registers.

Each access to the SDRAM address space validates the mode of the SDRAMC and generates an operation corresponding to this mode.

Definition at line 149 of file sdramc.c.

References SDRAM, SDRAM_BANK_BITS, SDRAM_CAS, SDRAM_COL_BITS, SDRAM_INIT_AUTO_REFRESH_COUNT, SDRAM_ROW_BITS, SDRAM_STABLE_CLOCK_INIT_DELAY, SDRAM_TMRD, SDRAM_TR, SDRAM_TRAS, SDRAM_TRC, SDRAM_TRCD, SDRAM_TRFC, SDRAM_TRP, SDRAM_TWR, SDRAM_TXSR, sdramc_enable_muxed_pins(), sdramc_ns_delay, and sdramc_us_delay.

Referenced by main().

00196   for (i = 0; i < SDRAM_INIT_AUTO_REFRESH_COUNT; i++)

00201 
00202   // Issue a LOAD MODE REGISTER command to the SDRAM.
00203   // This configures the SDRAM with the following parameters in the mode register:
00204   //  - bits 0 to 2: burst length: 1 (000b);
00205   //  - bit 3: burst type: sequential (0b);
00206   //  - bits 4 to 6: CAS latency: AVR32_SDRAMC.CR.cas;
00207   //  - bits 7 to 8: operating mode: standard operation (00b);
00208   //  - bit 9: write burst mode: programmed burst length (0b);
00209   //  - all other bits: reserved: 0b.
00210   AVR32_SDRAMC.mr = AVR32_SDRAMC_MR_MODE_LOAD_MODE;
00211   AVR32_SDRAMC.mr;
00212   sdram[0];
00213   sdramc_ns_delay(SDRAM_TMRD, hsb_mhz_up);
00214 
00215   // Switch the SDRAM Controller to normal mode.
00216   AVR32_SDRAMC.mr = AVR32_SDRAMC_MR_MODE_NORMAL;
00217   AVR32_SDRAMC.mr;
00218   sdram[0];
00219 
00220   // Write the refresh period into the SDRAMC Refresh Timer Register.
00221   // tR is rounded down because it is a maximal value.
00222   AVR32_SDRAMC.tr = (SDRAM_TR * hsb_mhz_dn) / 1000;
00223   AVR32_SDRAMC.tr;
